Goal Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager keeps track of the cell tower ids in your area while you are connected to a WiFi network. By keeping this information, the app tries to learn where your WiFi is located without using GPS.
string>
Authors: In affiliation with More information can be found at: Version %1$s This application belongs to the group of Privacy Friendly Apps developed by Karlsruhe Institute of Technology. Sourcecode licensed under Apache version 2.0. Images copyright KIT and Google Inc. Github-Repo SECUSO-Website
Help Permissions The permission for your coarse location is needed to retrieve nearby cell tower information. Tutorial Privacy Info CyanogenMod-based Distribution Due to a bug in CM 13 you have to enable the location service (GPS). Otherwise, no WiFi networks can be found.
Granting Permissions Adding a WiFi This is how it works SIM Card To control your WiFi based on the cell tower, the device has to be connected to a cell tower. Therefore, this functionality does not work on devices without a SIM card.
Welcome To retrieve nearby cell tower information Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager requires access to our coarse location. The permission can also be granted at a later point of time. To add a known WiFi to the list of managed WiFis, click the \"+"-button. Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager switches your device\'s WiFi on when you are near a known WiFi. Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager saves cell towers your mobile device is connected to while you are in range of a known WiFi network. Based on the saved cell towers Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager switches your WiFi on or off. You can furthermore define time slots, when your device\'s WiFi should automatically be turned off (e.g. at night). Welcome to Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager! This app automatically switches your WiFi off if you are not near a known WiFi network.
Unmanaged connection New unmanaged WiFi New unmanaged WiFi: %1$s Manage this connection automatically Touch to manage connections WiFi %1$s now managed.
General Settings Respect signal strength Cellular signal strength will be respected for location estimation. Show notifications A notification will be shown when connected to unmanaged WiFis. Request permissions Developer Settings Delete logfile Deleted logfile successfully. Logfile could not be deleted. Flush logfile Remove first-run-flag Hide developer settings
SSID unknown MACs Cell tower IDs
Automatic WiFi Management: Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager Jan Henzel, Patrick Jauernig, Dennis Werner General This app helps you automatically turning on/off your WiFi while you are not near a known WiFi. How it works The main goal is to avoid location tracking via WiFi, but WiFi Manager also saves battery life by automatically disabling your phones WiFi when it is not near a already known wireless network. Benefits By switching of the WiFi when it is not required, so called tracking via WiFi is avoided. Privacy Friendly WiFi Manager also saves battery life by automatically disabling your device\'s WiFi in case it is not near an already known WiFi network.
Default The default channel for every notification.
